Hey Sadistic Veigar,

Thanks for the report - we'll take a look and see what's going on with these particular skins. 

**EDIT:** We're aware of the Bad Santa Veigar issue and are working on a fix. As for Final Boss Veigar, it appears the ult is scaling; if this is not occurring on live (Patch 5.13) it should be fixed in the next patch (5.14).

Actually, I've figured out the issue.

I just got out of a custom game, and at 1850 AP It looked as it did before the ult size scaling with AP was even added to Veigar.

Basically, it starts out tiny and gets to its normal size, which is sort of underwhelming in my opinion.

Like, here it is at 50 AP: http://puu.sh/iZzqS/0963eda869.jpg

Here it is at 1850+ AP http://puu.sh/iZzrA/ffd7cf8361.jpg

So basically, it never gets bigger than it originally was before 5.13. Just starts out smaller and gets to the normal size.
